thread.title: Donna
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Donna

author: Donna
title: Donna
text: Was greeted promptly. I was dealing with a manager Mike, so I expected great service. I was viewing how some others were treated which was not 5 stars at all. Plenty of employees and plenty of customers but yet people still waiting to be acknowledged. But as far as my experience, nothing but awesome things to say. Mike did everything expected from a place where I am not as knowledgeable as some, tires alignments etc. He explained everything to me and I left knowing I would be come back again.
